SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol
Class RemoteUserSession

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.RemoteUserSession

public class RemoteUserSession
extends Object

The RemoteUserSession includes the session and connection management for a remote user. All connections for a particular remote user are created, maintained and released in the RemoteUserSession.

Constructor Detail

RemoteUserSession

public RemoteUserSession(InetAddress address,
                         int port,
                         RemoteUserProxyExt user)
Creates a new RemoteUserSession. No TCPSession to the remote user is yet available and thus no MainConnection.

Parameters:
address - the address of the remote user
port - the port
user - the remote user proxy

RemoteUserSession

public RemoteUserSession(TCPSession session,
                         MainConnection connection,
                         RemoteUserProxyExt user)
Creates a new RemoteUserSession. The TCPSession has been established and the MainConnection initiated.

Parameters:
session - the TCPSession
connection - the MainConnection
user - the remote user proxy
Method Detail

setTimestampFactory

public void setTimestampFactory(TimestampFactory factory)
Sets the timestamp factory.

Parameters:
factory - the timestamp factory to set

getTimestampFactory

public TimestampFactory getTimestampFactory()
Gets the timestamp factory.

Returns:
the timestamp factory

getMainConnection

public MainConnection getMainConnection()
                                 throws ConnectionException
Gets the MainConnection. If the session has not been initiated, the TCPSession is created and then the MainConnection started. Otherwise, the MainConnection is simply returned. If the session has been cleaned up (call to cleanup()), a ConnectionExeption is thrown.

Returns:
the MainConnection
Throws:
ConnectionException - if the session is shut down

startChannel

public Channel startChannel(String type,
                            ParticipantConnectionImpl connection,
                            String docId)
                     throws ConnectionException
Starts a new Channel to the remote user using this session. The channel is configured with the appropriate request handler according to the given type.

Parameters:
type - the type of the channel
port - the ParticipantPort for the ParticipantRequestHandler (optional)
docId - to open a session channel a document id can be passed
Returns:
the created Channel
Throws:
ConnectionException - if an error occurs

addSessionConnection

public SessionConnectionImpl addSessionConnection(String docId,
                                                  Channel collaborationChannel)
Adds a SessionConnection to this RemoteUserSession.

Parameters:
docId - the id of the shared document
collaborationChannel - the channel around which the SessionConnection will be wrapped
Returns:
the SessionConnectionImpl object

removeSessionConnection

public SessionConnectionImpl removeSessionConnection(String docId)
Removes a SessionConnection from this RemoteUserSession given the document id.

Parameters:
docId - the document id of the SessionConnection
Returns:
the removed SessionConnectionImpl object

hasSessionConnection

public boolean hasSessionConnection(String docId)
Checks whether this RemoteUserSession has a SessionConnection for the given document.

Parameters:
docId - the document id to check for an available SessionConnection
Returns:
true iff a SessionConnection is available

getSessionConnection

public SessionConnectionImpl getSessionConnection(String docId)
Gets a SessionConnection to this RemoteUserSession's user.

Parameters:
docId - the document id to get the SessionConnection for
Returns:
the SessionConnectionImpl object

addParticipantConnection

public ParticipantConnectionImpl addParticipantConnection(String docId)
Adds a ParticipantConnection.

Parameters:
docId - the document id the created ParticipantConnection is about
Returns:
the created ParticipantConnectionImpl

removeParticipantConnection

public ParticipantConnectionImpl removeParticipantConnection(String docId)
Removes a ParticipantConnection from this RemoteUserSession.

Parameters:
docId - the document id for which the ParticipantConnection is to be removed
Returns:
the removed ParticipantConnectionImpl object

hasParticipantConnection

public boolean hasParticipantConnection(String docId)
Checks whether a ParticipantConnection is available for the given document id.

Parameters:
docId - the document id to check for a ParticipantConnection
Returns:
true iff a ParticipantConnection is available

getParticipantConnection

public ParticipantConnectionImpl getParticipantConnection(String docId)
Gets the ParticipantConnection for the given document id or null if none is available.

Parameters:
docId - the document id to get the ParticipantConnection for
Returns:
the ParticipantConnectionImpl object for the document id

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Cleans up the session. No methods may be called after a call to cleanup(). This method is called when the BEEP session has terminated already.

close

public void close()
Closes the active TCPSession and the MainConnection. This method must be called when the TCPSession is still active.

isAlive

public boolean isAlive()
Checks whether this RemoteUserSession is still alive i.e. the session to the remote user is in active state.

Returns:
true if the session is still alive

isInitiated

public boolean isInitiated()
Determines whether this RemoteUserSession has its TCPSession established with the remote user or not.

Returns:
true if the session with the remote user is established

getUser

public RemoteUserProxyExt getUser()
Gets this RemoteUserSession's user.

Returns:
the RemoteUserProxyExt of this session

getHost

public InetAddress getHost()
Gets the target host of this session.

Returns:
the target host of this session

getPort

public int getPort()
Gets the port of the target host.

Returns:
the port of the target host
